title: 084 - Mitt, The Boy Genius
description: On today's show, the guys unearth the fact that Mitt might actually be a savant, Nick's out on rabbits, and they dive into a packed Pod FOD that includes the new Gundam robot that might have secretly been General Hirohito's weaponry, chat about WAP, the worst shows on TV that lasted the longest, the Rock allegedly ripping the gate off of his house because it wouldn't open, Billy Tubes is in a little bit better of a mood for awhile, Pat and Digs' grade school teacher who had an orangutan as a pet, and much more. Subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for clips from this show, all PMI content including the live show, plus McAfee Mafia members will get the exclusive full videos from The Pod as well as much more. Send in your questions for the FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening to us, enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
